meanings.definition: A diagnostic test that uses X-rays to visualize the arteries.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended an arteriogram to check my arteries.
meanings.sent2: The arteriogram showed a blockage in the artery.
meanings.sent3: During the arteriogram, I felt like a superhero getting an X-ray vision of my arteries.
meanings.sent4: The arteriogram revealed a roadmap of my circulatory system.
meanings.sent5: The arteriogram captured a snapshot of my blood flow in action.

meanings.definition: The resulting image produced by an arteriogram.
meanings.sent1: The arteriogram displayed a clear picture of the arteries.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the detail in the arteriogram image.
meanings.sent3: The arteriogram image looked like a colorful abstract painting.
meanings.sent4: Her arteriogram resembled a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The arteriogram image was as intricate as a spider's web.
